name: genitourinary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the genital organs (= outer sexual organs) and the urinary organs (= the parts of the body that produce and carry urine): genitourinary medicine She is a consultant in genitourinary medicine. It may be an autoimmune reaction to previous genitourinary infections. The association of depression and GU disease was not found to be significant.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can get tested at the genitourinary clinic attached to your local hospital.Genitourinary prolapse occurs when there is descent of one or more of the pelvic organs.The incidence of postoperative urinary tract infections is quite high in genitourinary surgery.
